languages.text: "Ох, Ваша Светлость... да, положа руку на сердце, на этих сборищах и я, бывает, носом клюю, а бедную госпожу Кибеллу это, кхм, уныние так точно усыпит!"

traits.locale_text: "Ох, Ваша Светлость... да, положа руку на сердце, на этих сборищах и я, бывает, носом клюю, а бедную госпожу Кибеллу это, ахем, уныние так точно усыпит!"

languages.text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"
languages.original_text: "Ох, Ваша Светлость... да, положа руку на сердце, на этих сборищах и я, бывает, носом клюю, а бедную госпожу Кибеллу это, кхм, уныние так точно усыпит!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh dear. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Not to put too fine a point on it, but even I am struggling to stay awake at those meetings. Poor mistress Kibellah quickly succumb to all the droning and tedium!"

"Oh dear. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Not to put too fine a point on it, but even I am struggling to stay awake at those meetings. Poor mistress Kibellah quickly succumb to all the droning and tedium!"

"Oh dear. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Not to put too fine a point on it, but even I am struggling to stay awake at those meetings. Poor mistress Kibellah did not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

"Oh dear. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Not to put too fine a point on it, but even I am struggling to stay awake at those meetings. Poor mistress Kibellah did not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

"Oh dear. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Not to put too fine a point on it, but even I am struggling to stay awake at those meetings. Poor mistress Kibellah did not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

"Oh dear. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Not to put too fine a point on it, but even I am struggling to stay awake at those meetings. Poor mistress Kibellah did not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"
"Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"
"Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

languages.text: « Oh, Votre Seigneurie... Pour tout vous avouer, j'ai moi-même beaucoup de mal à rester éveillé lors de ces réunions. La pauvre maîtresse Kibellah ne tiendrait pas deux minutes au milieu de tout ce bourdonnement assommant ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh là, là. Votre Seigneurie... Sans vouloir vous manquer de respect, j'ai moi-même déjà beaucoup de mal à rester éveillé lors de ces réunions. C'est d'un ennui ! Maîtresse Kibellah ne tiendrait pas deux minutes au milieu de tout ce bourdonnement assommant ! »

languages.text: «Ay... Mi{mf|lord|lady}... le seré sincero, hasta a mí me cuesta seguir despierto en esas reuniones. ¡La pobre maestra Kibellah no tardaría en dormirse en medio del tedio y la palabrería!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

traits.locale_text: «Ay... Mi{mf|lord|lady}... le seré sincero, hasta a mí me cuesta seguir despierto en esas reuniones. ¡La pobre maestra Kibellah no tardó en dormirse en medio del tedio y la palabrería!».

languages.text: 「ああ、陛下…。率直に申し上げますと、私でさえあの会議では眠気を堪えるのがやっとです。可哀想なキベラ様は、あの退屈で耐え難い時間の中ではきっと長続きはしないでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、陛下…あまり細かく言いたくはありませんが、私でさえあの会議で起きているのは苦労しているのです。可哀想にキベラ氏など、あまりに退屈で長く目を開けて入られないほどですよ！」

languages.text: “噢，大人……老实说，即便是我，也很难在这样的会议上全程保持清醒。若是换成了可怜的绮贝菈女士，听着那些单调的嗡嗡声，她恐怕根本撑不了多久！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，天哪，大人……虽然这么说可能不太好，但即便是我，也很难在这样的会议上全程保持清醒。在这单调的嗡嗡声中，可怜的绮贝菈女士恐怕撑不了多久！”

languages.text: "Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Um ehrlich zu sein, fällt es mir schwer, bei diesen Zusammenkünften wach zu bleiben. Die arme Meisterin Kibellah würde diese dröhnende Langeweile gewiss nicht lange ertragen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"

traits.locale_text: "Ach herrje. Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Um es geradeheraus zu sagen, selbst ich habe Mühe, bei derlei Terminen wach zu bleiben. Die arme Herrin Kibellah hielt das Gelaber und die Langeweile nicht lange aus."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Açık konuşmam gerekirse o toplantılarda ben bile gözlerimi açık tutmakta zorlanıyorum. Zavallı Kibellah Hanım, tüm o monotonluğa ve sıkıcılığa uzun süre dayanamaz!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... To be perfectly frank, even I struggle to stay awake at those meetings. Poor Mistress Kibellah would surely not last long amid all the droning and tedium!"
